mapper.insert: INSERT INTO led_pwr_schedule (sch_nm, sch_start_date, sch_end_date, time_pwr_on, time_pwr_off, run_day_week) VALUES (#{scheduleName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{scheduleDay});
mapper.select: SELECT schedule_id, sch_start_date, sch_end_date, time_pwr_on, time_pwr_off, run_day_week FROM led_pwr_schedule WHERE #{nowDate} between sch_start_date AND sch_end_date
